raw akas.title: Penguins on a Plane: Great Animal Moves

akas: Penguins on a Plane: Great Animal Moves (original title)
akas from release info: Penguins on a Plane: Great Animal Moves (original title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Penguins on a Plane: Great Animal Moves (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

1.plot: A flock of gentoo penguins are flown from New Zealand to Birmingham's National Sea Life Centre, requiring a hi-tech, custom-built transport crate costing £40,000. With refrigeration, air filtering and even seatbelts, the 'penguin hotel' must keep the birds in peak physical condition during their 12,500-mile journey.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Penguins on a Plane: Great Animal Moves (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

2.plot: At Crocodiles of the World in Brize Norton, Shaun Foggett is preparing to receive three of the most aggressive and territorial crocs in the world - saltwater crocodiles. They are arriving from a zoo in Normandy, France. At Birmingham's National Sea Life Centre a seven-stone, six-foot bowmouth guitar shark named Boris has to be caught and stretchered into a bespoke transportation tank to travel 125 miles to Blackpool and in Hungary, specialist wildlife transporter Matt Ford tries all the tricks of the trade to lure two timid Arctic wolves into their transport crates. ...

imdb.title: Penguins on a Plane: Great Animal Moves
plot: Follows the expert handlers entrusted with transporting some of the world's most precious and challenging cargo safely to their destinations.
